summary: This bill, the 'Over-the-Counter Monograph Drug User Fee Amendments,' revises and extends the user fee program for over-the-counter (OTC) monograph drugs. It amends the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to update definitions, adjust fee structures for facilities, establish revenue amounts for fiscal years 2026-2030, and modify reporting requirements and sunset dates for the program. The amendments are designed to provide funding for the FDA's OTC drug activities.  The effective date is October 1, 2025 or the date of enactment, whichever is later.
